TextView.android:text: Request to Change the Classification of The Real Property
To indicate in the Tax Declaration the new property classification such as Residential, Agricultural, Commercial, Industrial, Mineral, Special or Timber.
G2C - Government to Citizen\nG2G - Government to Government
Tax Declarant/Owner, Authorized Representative of the Declarant/Owner & Coordinating Offices
4. Pictures of the Property in 2 angles (1 printed/electronic copy)
8. Tax Clearance of Current Year (1 original copy)
1. Accomplishs Request Form and submits the required documents
1.1. Provides Request Form and evaluates the required documents according to the Checklist of Requirements.
- If the evaluated documents are incomplete, asks for the Checklist of Requirements Form and secures the lacking documents.
1.2. If the submitted documents are lacking, returns the submitted documents. Advises client to secure the required documents and gives a copy of the Checklist Form. End of Service
- If the required documents are complete, accomplishes the Sworn Statement.
1.3. If the required documents are complete, let the client accomplish the Sworn Statement.
2.4. Checks data entries & photocopy the documents
2.5. Prints the FAAS, Tax Declaration, NOA & Inspection Report
2.6. Verifies & signs the printed and supporting documents
2.7. Segregates the assessment documents for transmittal
3.1. Records documents in the logbook. Issues the assessment documents to the client.
4. Accomplishes the Client Satisfaction Survey (CSS) and drops in the feedback drop box.
4.1. Gives CSS form for service feedback. Instructs the client to place the accomplished CSS form in the feedback drop box.
